text: Tales from Earthsea, by Ursula K. Le Guin, written in 2001, is a collection of short stories from Le Guin's Earthsea series. ==Stories== * "The Finder" * "Darkrose and Diamond" * "The Bones of the Earth" * "On The High Marsh" * "Dragonfly" Category:2001 books Category:Earthsea books
title: Tales from Earthsea
